# markReady()

**Instance Method**

Indicates to a connection that your protocol’s handshake is complete.

## Declaration

```swift
final func markReady()
```

## Related Documentation

- **NWProtocolFramer.StartResult.willMarkReady**: The protocol will perform a handshake, preventing the overall connection from becoming ready until [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/NWProtocolFramer/Instance/markReady()] is called.

## Managing Instance Lifetime

- **markFailed(error:)**: Indicates to a connection that your protocol has encountered an error, or has gracefully closed.
- **prependApplicationProtocol(options:)**: Dynamically adds another protocol that will run above your protocol after your protocol calls [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/NWProtocolFramer/Instance/markReady()].
